body_html:
What is a lot of memory? It looks like from the log the tensor it is allocating was 148MB? What GPU do you have? How much memory does it have?

It is a Titan X 2016 [GP102 (Pascal)], it has 11.90 GiB of memory.

Does it work if you write checkpoints frequently and restart? That would verify if it is a memory leak.

It was not a memory leak, but a long sequence that caused that particular issue. But the general issue still exists.

It was not a memory leak, but a long sequence that caused that particular issue. But the general issue still exists.
body:
> What is a lot of memory? It looks like from the log the tensor it is allocating was 148MB? What GPU do you have? How much memory does it have?

It is a Titan X 2016 [GP102 (Pascal)], it has 11.90 GiB of memory.

> Does it work if you write checkpoints frequently and restart? That would verify if it is a memory leak.

It was not a memory leak, but a long sequence that caused that particular issue. But the general issue still exists.
